text: Ted Chiricos is an American criminologist and the William Julius Wilson Professor of Criminology at Florida State University. ==Early life and education== Chiricos received a bachelor in Sociology from Merrimack College in 1963, a masters in sociology from University of Massachusetts Amherst in 1965 and a Ph.D. in sociology from University of Massachusetts Amherst in 1968. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Florida State University faculty Category:American criminologists Category:University of Massachusetts Amherst alumni Category:Merrimack College alumni
title: Ted Chiricos
